text:
Im trying to setup the local dev environment but running into an error Im unable to resolve

```? Enter a unique name to reference your account: accountName
A RequestError has occurred. Error: unable to get local issuer certificate```
```A TypeError has occurred. Cannot destructure property `accountId` of 'undefined' or 'null'.```
 I run
```npx hs init and paste my key but after adding a name I run into this error```
any ideas why this is happening?
Im thinking it is due to corporate firewall or VPN?
